abstract: On Sept. 15, Microsoft plans to launch its new Zune HD portable media player, which could actually take the fight to Apple’s iPod Touch.
snippet: On Sept. 15, Microsoft plans to launch its new Zune HD portable media player, which could actually take the fight to Apple’s iPod Touch.
lead_paragraph: How many times have you read this on a gadget blog:

headline.main: Yet Another Media Player Plans to Take on the Leader
headline.print_headline: Yet Another Media Player Plans to Take On the Leader
